item.title: Moving to Github
item.description: From now on the website of our reasearch group is online at https://rahmannlab.github.io . The content is rendered using Hugo on Travis-CI or locally. Source code of newly developed programs will be part of our Github group github.com/rahmannlab. Old projects are mainly located at bitbucket.org/genomeinformatics and will be maintained there.

item.title: Hugo Port
item.description: Porting to Hugo The research group around Sven Rahmann upgrades the website from WordPress to Hugo. See how easy this will be.
